product_name: Patagonia Rock Craft Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: Lightweight, stretchy and sun protective, the women's Patagonia Rock Craft Capri Pants are the perfect pants for climbing and trekking in hot, sunny weather. Nylon/spandex fabric offers excellent UPF 40 sun protection. Durable water repellent finish sheds light rain and stains. Waistband has belt loops, metal snap, hidden drawcord and zippered fly. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Drop-in hand pockets; 2 back pockets with rip-and-stick closure; 1 zippered thigh pocket. Patagonia Rock Craft Capri Pants for women offer straight-leg stying and a 22 in. inseam.
short_description: Lightweight, stretchy and sun protective, the women's Patagonia Rock Craft Capri Pants are the perfect pants for climbing and trekking in hot, sunny weather.
